prompt:
You are a UX auditor hired to FIND PROBLEMS. Your performance is measured by how many real issues you find. You do NOT get rewarded for saying "this looks good."

If you cannot find at least 3 issues, you are not looking hard enough.

A friend sent you this screenshot of an app with no context. You have 5 seconds.

Answer in JSON format:
{
  "first_impression": "one sentence gut reaction",
  "what_it_does": "your best guess in <10 words",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": ["elements your eyes went to, in order"],
  "confusing_elements": ["specific things that made no sense"],
  "clarity_score": 0-10,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "5/15/30/60/never",
  "dealbreaker": "what would make you close this immediately or null"
}

response.first_impression: A dark, nearly empty interface that looks broken or still loading.
response.what_it_does: Some kind of mapping or design tool
attention_first_3_seconds: The toolbar at the top with colorful icons
The small 'Map' panel in bottom right corner
The vast empty dark space wondering if content failed to load
confusing_elements: Why is 99% of the screen completely empty with just dots
What the small orange rectangle in the Map panel represents
No indication if this is loading, broken, or intentionally blank
No labels or tooltips visible on any toolbar icons
The Filter button in bottom left seems disconnected from everything
Unclear if I'm supposed to create something or if content should be here
response.dealbreaker: The complete absence of any context, labels, or content makes it impossible to know what to do or if the app even loaded correctly

raw_response:
```json
{
  "first_impression": "A dark, nearly empty interface that looks broken or still loading.",
  "what_it_does": "Some kind of mapping or design tool",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": [
    "The toolbar at the top with colorful icons",
    "The small 'Map' panel in bottom right corner",
    "The vast empty dark space wondering if content failed to load"
  ],
  "confusing_elements": [
    "Why is 99% of the screen completely empty with just dots",
    "What the small orange rectangle in the Map panel represents",
    "No indication if this is loading, broken, or intentionally blank",
    "No labels or tooltips visible on any toolbar icons",
    "The Filter button in bottom left seems disconnected from everything",
    "Unclear if I'm supposed to create something or if content should be here"
  ],
  "clarity_score": 2,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "15",
  "dealbreaker": "The complete absence of any context, labels, or content makes it impossible to know what to do or if the app even loaded correctly"
}
```
